name: HSP_BUCKET_2
description: This table contains hospital liability bucket information from the Hospital Liability Buckets (HLB) master file. This table does not include information for pre-allocated HLB records that are not yet in use.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the bucket record.

columns.name: TIMELY_FILING_DATE
columns.description: The timely filing deadline date for insurance buckets. This is blank for Late Write Off and Supplemental Payment Claim buckets.

columns.name: REPLACEMENT_TIMELY_FILING_DATE
columns.description: The replacement timely filing deadline date for insurance buckets. This is blank for Late Write Off and Supplemental Payment Claim buckets.
